description: Ready in 15 minutes, this easy wonton noodle soup recipe uses ready-made wontons for a fuss-free meal to beat the midweek dinner rush.
name: Best Wonton Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: ginger, cut into 3cm-piece, peeled, finely grated
spring onion, thinly sliced, to serve
red chilli, thinly sliced, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Cook wontons in a large saucepan of boiling water for 10 minutes, adding noodles in the last 3 minutes of cooking or until or wontons are cooked and noodles are tender. Drain. Divide noodles and wontons among bowls.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic, ginger and star anise, then cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant.

Add stock and soy, then bring to the boil. Add broccoli and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Remove and discard star anise. Ladle broth mixture over noodles and wontons. Serve topped with onion and chilli.
